author: Luc Olinga
title: Elon Musk Calls the U.S. Dollar ‘Hopeless,’ Says His America Party Will Embrace Bitcoin
description: The billionaire, in another escalating feud with Trump, suggests that crypto could be part of his plan to disrupt American politics.
content: As details about his new political venture begin to emerge, Elon Musk has confirmed that the “America Party” will embrace Bitcoin, a move that solidifies the partys anti-establishment and tech-centri… [+2675 chars]
